ilog.concert

Interface IloTupleMap

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IloMap

    public interface IloTupleMap
extends IloMap
    This class represents a convenient way to map tuple values.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getAt(IloMapIndexArray indexes, IloTuple tuple)
      Returns the value of the element pointed to by indexes from the map.
      IloDiscreteDataCollection getIndexer()
      Returns the data collection that indexes the map.
      IloTupleSchema getSchema()
      Returns the schema of the tuples that are in the current map.
      IloTuple makeTuple()
      Creates an empty tuple to be filled by getAt
      void setAt(IloMapIndexArray indexes, IloTuple v)
      Sets the element pointed to by indexes from the map to v.

      • Methods inherited from interface ilog.concert.IloMap

        getName, getNbDim, getNonEmptySlotSize, getSize, getTotalSize, makeMapIndexer, setName

    • Method Detail

      • getAt

        void getAt(IloMapIndexArray indexes,
         IloTuple tuple)
           throws IloException
        Returns the value of the element pointed to by indexes from the map. It fills the given tuple. Example with a map: M[i in 1..5][j in 1..2] = M.getAt( [1][2], t ) will fill t with M[1][2] that is <2>.
        Throws:
        IloException

      • makeTuple

        IloTuple makeTuple()
                   throws IloException
        Creates an empty tuple to be filled by getAt
        Throws:
        IloException

      • setAt

        void setAt(IloMapIndexArray indexes,
         IloTuple v)
           throws IloException
        Sets the element pointed to by indexes from the map to v. Example with a map: M[i in 1..5][j in 1..2] = M.setAt( [1][2], t ) will fill M[1][2] with the values from t.
        Throws:
        IloException

      • getSchema

        IloTupleSchema getSchema()
        Returns the schema of the tuples that are in the current map.

      • getIndexer

        IloDiscreteDataCollection getIndexer()
        Returns the data collection that indexes the map.
